title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 March 2017 - XWiki
content:
<xwikiorg\_guest\_1> has joined #xwiki  
02:22 <xwikiorg\_guest\_1> has quit  
05:57 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
06:06 <sgc072> has quit  
06:21 <blackglade> has joined #xwiki  
06:28 <blackglade> has quit  
07:39 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:50 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
08:51 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:08 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:12 <vmassol> good morning eveyrone  
09:12 <vmassol> tmortagne: we're releasing this morning so maybe best to not upgrade deps right now since that doesn't give us time to test the resulting build at all  
09:13 <tmortagne> vmassol: we are upgrading 9.2  
09:13 <tmortagne> vmassol: we are releasing 9.2  
09:13 <vmassol> my bad  
09:13 <vmassol> master vs branch  
09:13 <vmassol> got it :)  
09:14 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> I update the translation on stable-9.2.x to gain time  
11:25 <vmassol> FYI, I've just added a step to the release process at http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/#HReleasetheproject about translations  
12:52 <gdelhumeau> mflorea1: what is your status on XWIKI-14123?  
12:55 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: I think this one is for you: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-9.2.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-extension-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testShowDetails/  
12:56 <gdelhumeau> wdyt?  
13:23 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:26 <msmeria> has quit  
13:57 <vmassol> Question: Does anyone know where the "createblogpost" key is used (from the main App\*Resources.properties)? I'm moving it to deprecated but want to be sure. I couldn't find a usage of it in platform  
13:57 \* vmassol sent a long message: vmassol\_2017-03-27\_11:57:03.txt - https://matrix.org/\_matrix/media/v1/download/matrix.org/TAVaqpkrwgLqgYaSylySKQgb  
14:10 <acotiuga> has quit  
14:12 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <vmassol> cjd: you may want to check http://markmail.org/message/delyav5a3hdtzy7w to help the guy or improve the doc for the attachment porter maybe.  
14:39 <vmassol> thx  
14:43 <cjd[m]> It's unfortunate that FSAttach is not default because otherwise he wouldn't have this issue.  
14:44 <cjd[m]> But if he doesn't understand the concept of groovy scripts running in the browser, maybe the best thing he can do at this point is request commercial support.  
14:49 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:51 <msmeria1> has quit  
14:58 <vmassol> is it mentioned somewhere cjd ?  
14:58 <vmassol> that the groovy script needs to be executed in a wiki page?  
15:29 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <msmeria> has quit  
15:47 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: are we ready to start the release?  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> I'm here: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/ReleasePlan92  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> waiting for the CI to finish  
15:48 <vmassol> be careful to not wait too long  
15:48 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: did you had a chance to look at http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-9.2.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-extension-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.extension/ExtensionTest/testShowDetails/ ?  
15:48 <vmassol> since you need to compute the time you need to finish it  
15:49 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: not yet  
15:49 <tmortagne> looing now  
15:52 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: should be ok now  
15:52 <vmassol> going to stop node1 and copy node2 perm dir on node1 for xwiki.org  
15:57 <mflorea> has quit  
15:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

17:42 <gdelhumeau> mflorea1: Age:3 http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-9.2.x/lastCompletedBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui/LanguageTest/testChangeLanguageInMonolingualModeUsingTheAdministrationPreference/  
17:42 <gdelhumeau> did you noticed it?  
17:43 <gdelhumeau> same here: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium-9.2.x/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/  
17:46 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
17:49 <gdelhumeau\_> has joined #xwiki  
17:50 <gdelhumeau\_> I think I will stop using riot  
17:50 <gdelhumeau\_> cannot see who is only and who is not quickly  
17:50 <gdelhumeau\_> -only+online  
17:51 <sgc072> has quit  
17:56 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
18:13 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau\_: yes it's not super clear  
18:16 <vmassol> blocker issue to fix https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-14126  
18:22 <vmassol\_irc> has joined #xwiki  
18:26 <vmassol\_irc> has quit  
18:29 <vmassol> gdelhumeau\_: you don't need to stop, we're all always online since we use riot ;)  
18:30 <vmassol> btw in my riot client, I see who's online and who's not I think  
18:30 <vmassol> seems online ones are pushed up in the and are not greyed out  
18:31 <vmassol> checking vs irc  
18:32 <vmassol> hmm no it must have some other meaning  
18:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: you see who is online on riot only, no idea for IRC users  
18:33 <vmassol> for example woshilapin is marked offline in riot  
18:33 <vmassol> but i guess he's online  
18:34 <woshilapin> Yes, Riot is not that good with online/offline status  
18:34 <tmortagne> better example is gdelhumeau\_ who ismarked offline :)  
18:34 <tmortagne> better example is gdelhumeau\_ who is marked offline :)  
18:35 <tmortagne> if I trust riot only 4 people are online  
18:35 <vmassol> he's online for me  
18:35 <tmortagne> no  
18:35 <vmassol> 5 are online for me on riot  
18:35 <tmortagne> gdelumeau is online  
18:35 <tmortagne> but gdelhumeau\_ is marked offline  
18:35 <vmassol> that must be irc  
18:35 <tmortagne> yes  
18:35 <vmassol> We only incrementally synchronise the membership lists when folks speak in either IRC or Matrix. This is to avoid flooding either IRC or Matrix with lurkers when the bridge initially joins a channel. We have some plans to improve this in future – see BOTS-53 for some of the sordid details."  
18:35 <tmortagne> which is what we were talking about :) IRC users marked offline  
18:35 <vmassol> https://matrix.org/jira/browse/BOTS-53  
18:35 <tmortagne> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/IRC#HIRC is not very complex either  
18:35 <vmassol> in any case we shuold do as cjd is doing on cryptpad, ie advertise riot.im  
18:35 <tmortagne> my pont was that you don't need a client with the enbedded client obviously  
18:35 <vmassol> since it's the simplest for users to join using the web ui  
18:35 <vmassol> (they don't even need to register anywhere)  
18:35 <vmassol> you need a client  
18:35 <vmassol> and the embedded client is quite crappy  
18:35 <vmassol> a link to https://riot.im/app/#/room/#freenode\_#xwiki:matrix.org is all we need  
18:47 <woshilapin[m]> has joined #xwiki  
18:50 <cjd[m]> https://riot.im/app/#/room/#xwiki:matrix.org is shorter and provides more control  
18:53 <gdelhumeau\_> has quit

20:55 <dmidma> Any help plz?

23:39 <vmassol> on https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13420  
23:39 <vmassol> gtg  
23:39 <vmassol> good night, see you tomorrow  
23:41 <dmidma> Thank you =D  
23:41 <dmidma> Good night ♡
